Five covered squares in a row on a card is a winner.The one virtue of any game that is...

Jun 6, 2010

That's not the most interesting part: in addition to all of that, it also analyzes your "leavings" and prepares a summary, which it then emails to your doctor. These toilets are gaining popularity in Japan.From a consumer standpoint, this is pretty easy to...
